name: Void Cavitation
description:
In the distant future humanity fight against a biomechanical alien race which once heald the secrets of the super technology of void cavitation and you Vasily, you are the only human that can biologically control the void cavitation, at least that is what the scientist that make you evolve thought.

Arrow Keys to move, "W" to fire and Space Bar to jump.

Get to the console with the letter "E" to pass the level.
